subject: Re: Wolf IQ Next Steps
preview: Hi Maddy,  No worries!  We’re not offering SEO trainings/webinar at the moment, but we’ll definitely keep you in the loop if that changes!  Hope you have a lovely weekend!

full_threads.body:
Hi Maddy,

No worries!

We’re not offering SEO trainings/webinar at the moment, but we’ll definitely keep you in the loop if that changes!

Hope you have a lovely weekend!
(Time: 40mins) This was for the updates pushed to live and minor adjustments.

Hi Joy,

That looks all good to us!

From here if there's any other small tweaks we want to make, we will reach out when needed.

Wondering if you guys ever run webinars or training on SEO and that type of thing so we can brush up our skills. Might be something we'd be interested in.

Thanks again for all your help 😊

Kind Regards
MADELINE TAYLOR | Administration



E: maddy@structorprojects.com.au | P: 02 6331 5428

A: PO Box 9053, Bathurst NSW 2795

W: structorprojects.com.au

Hi Maddy,

Our apologies! That should be fixed by now.

We have also deployed updates on the Homepage and Portfolio. Kindly check if it is all good on your end.

Let me know if you have any further queries.

Hi Joy,

I have noticed when I'm on our website on any page other than the home page, when I click "Home" from the top menu it navigates to a different version of the home page.

I'm guessing it takes me to the below, instead of the updated 2025 Home page. However, if I click our logo at the top right of any page it goes to the correct new homepage. Can you please check this. Thank you.



Kind Regards
MADELINE TAYLOR | Administration



E: maddy@structorprojects.com.au | P: 02 6331 5428

A: PO Box 9053, Bathurst NSW 2795

W: structorprojects.com.au

Hi Maddy,

No worries at all! We’ll get those tweaks sorted and roll the Home and Portfolio updates out to the live site.

I’ll give you a shout once it’s all done.

Hi Joy,

Oh I mistakenly thought the new home page was already live, that explains my issue!

I'm happy for the updates to be made live, thank you.

Only one minor tweak - did you have any luck moving H1 & H2 over to the right slightly more? Inline and underneath the portfolio tab would look better I feel.

Thank you.



Kind Regards
MADELINE TAYLOR | Administration



E: maddy@structorprojects.com.au | P: 02 6331 5428

Hi Maddy,

Hope you had a great weekend!

It might just be a caching issue on the homepage (both live and 2025 version), as everything’s looking fine on our end.

Also, we appreciate your feedback on the Portfolio tabs.
We’re all good to roll this out to live. Just wanted to check if you would like us to push the new Home 2025 live at the same time?

Keen to hear back from you soon so we can get it all sorted.

Hello Joy,

Looking good, thank you for the update.

I have been having a play around this morning with the projects displayed on our homepage - order, titles etc. However the changes don't seem to have been applied after I hit update. I assumed 'Home 2025' is the page to work off is that right?



I'm happy with the portfolio tabs to be updated too, they look much better thank you.

Kind Regards
MADELINE TAYLOR | Administration

Hi Maddy,

Happy Friday!

We’re pleased to let you know that the homepage updates are now live:
🔗 View updated homepage

We’ve also prepared a duplicate of the Portfolio page so you can review the suggested new design of the tabs before we publish them:
🔗 Preview Portfolio v2

Once you’re happy with the changes, we can deploy the updated Portfolio tabs to the live site.

Looking forward to your feedback, and wishing you a lovely weekend ahead!

Hi Maddie,

Just to give you an update, your requests are already in progress.

We will send you an update tomorrow once completed.

Feel free to let me know if you have any questions.

Hi Maddie,

Hope you are doing well!

I would like to let you know I’ve shared your requests with our team.

I’ll follow up with you tomorrow once we have an update and answers to your queries.

Let me know if anything else comes up in the meantime!

action.text: Allie Borcena assigned to Joy T

full_threads.body:
Hey @joy passing this to you, this is a custom dev - client wants some revision 🙏

Here is the click-up link: https://app.clickup.com/t/86czb0gwt

The developer in-charge is @whil

Hello Allie, Thanks for sending this through! This is looking good so far, only a few minor changes to make below please.
  • Can you please align H2 to the right hand side.
  • Can you please make H2 the aqua colour of our logo (or if this is something I can do, I'm happy to make that change)
  • If possible can both H1 & H2 be moved over to the right a bit more?
  • Lastly, just checking this is the same font that's used throughout our site? I believe it's correct, however can we please space out the letters slightly, more like the blue text on the home page.
Separate to the homepage, is there anything else we can do with these menu options under the Portfolio tab? We think they look a bit dated or something. Perhaps we could remove the box and just have the wording? Open to your ideas. Thank you, appreciate what you've done so far. 😊 Kind Regards MADELINE TAYLOR | Administration E: maddy@structorprojects.com.au | P: 02 6331 5428 A: PO Box 9053, Bathurst NSW 2795 W: structorprojects.com.au The information transmitted is intended only for the person or entity to which it is addressed and may contain confidential and/or privileged material. Hi Maddy,

Happy Wednesday

Just a quick heads-up that we’ve set up a staging version of the homepage here:
https://www.structorprojects.com.au/home-2025/

Here’s what we’ve done so far:
  • H1 set to “Design & Construction” across all showcased projects
  • H2 dynamically shows Commercial / Design / Self Storage depending on the project
  • You can now customise the H2 for each project under the “captions” section when adding new ones

Let us know if that’s looking right to you, we’re happy to tweak anything as needed.
